entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as murmuring a question to Snape.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: A person who has given help to the Ministry after the Dark Lord fell and is now panicking due to retribution fears.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A Hogwarts teacher who is having a conversation with Dumbledore about Karkaroff's intentions.

entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: A person who has come giggling in from the grounds along with Roger Davies.

entities.name: roger davies
entities.description: A person who has come giggling in from the grounds along with Fleur Delacour.

entities.name: igor karkaroff
entities.description: Mentioned as a coward by Dumbledore and compared to Snape.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: An organization that has received help from Karkaroff after the Dark Lord fell.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: A person who is mentioned as having fallen and for whom Karkaroff gave help to the Ministry.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is concerned about Karkaroff's intentions and his fear of retribution.
Snape disapproves of Karkaroff's intention to flee if the Mark burns.
Dumbledore compares Igor Karkaroff to Snape, stating that Snape is a braver man.
Snape observes Fleur Delacour and Roger Davies as they come giggling in from the grounds.
